body: @PentacleMonster Imo its more like since he "made it" he could now do whatever he pleases. Look at those works tho, the attention and love put in the drawing is just way too excessive to be regarded as solely commercial commission. Don't know if you have read the vanilla GITS books, there was surely some solid sf settings but the characters are just very different from the tv and film adaptation (like Motoko, in the book she was much, much on the talkative and energetic side). You can just tell he genuinely LOVES eroticism as much as science fiction. As an erotic artist he still goes extra, extra miles to create beautiful fictional scenarios and lovable characters. The only bad I'm seeing here is his arranging of elements and the sheer amount of writing made this a translation nightmare lol might as well add one more reason to learn the language

@gerent.  I really don't know what to say.  His works like GITS and Appleseed are great, but i haven't seen anything new from him since the Skycrawler movie and some Appleseed movies.  Frankly, I wonder if he does this stuff on the side or decided to move to hentai because it is easier to write and stuff?  I mean the guy should have it made already if he didn't waste the money from the GITS franchise.
Hey kids! Don't get high off your own supply, 'cause this man use to be a creative visionary now he only creates this mess; so, let that be a lesson to you.
Stop making porn, and create Masterpiece like GITS again u fatass.
I love the art work truly amazing
wow, never though it will happen
@Kanrabat - True, it's probably first uncensored version of Masamune Shirow works.
Holy fuck. to have THIS uncensored is a gift from the gods!
